name: BudgetFox
description:
I highly suggest downloading the game because I didn't have time to optimize the physics... so I hope you have a beefy CPU if you intend to play the WebGL version 😅 

Created from scratch in 3 hours for Trijam 111 ( https://itch.io/jam/trijam-111). Here's the live stream I did for time proof: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/947181826

Music and sound from the JDB - Retro Music Pack

Controls:

  • Use your mouse to move and fire! That's it :)
